document.full_text: a serbian blogger reports that just 30 supporters of ratko mladic, the former commander of the bosnian serb army, gathered in central belgrade to protest his arrest on thursday.
document.title: the lede: just dozens rally for mladic in belgrade
lines_and_colors: a serbian blogger reports that just 30 supporters of ratko mladic, the former commander of the bosnian serb army, gathered in central belgrade to protest his arrest on thursday.
